entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
